    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static <T> java.io.InputStream open(FileReference ref,
                                           java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                           java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                           NotSupportedException
        Open an input stream given a file reference. The parses the URI and opens the file appropriately to the URI type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Ignored
        Parameters:
        ref - The reference to open.
        clazz - A class from the package to search when opening JAR resources.
        Returns:
        An input stream for the file to read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the file can't be opened
        java.net.URISyntaxException - When the URI syntax is bad
        NotSupportedException - When the URI type isn't supported
